content: {"name": "Salvation Army Hilltop", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Please call 614-341-2282 to make an appointment\n\n", "email": "", "url": "easternusa.salvationarmy.org/southwest-ohio/central-ohio/columbus-hilltop-corps/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2300 West Mound Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hilltop", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43204", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.93981230000001, "longitude": -83.05902549999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 274-7600", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
